cloud.title: Cloud Management
cloud.tips: With GoodCloud, you can manage routers in groups, check real-time router status, set up routers remotely, operate routers in batch and monitor connected clients etc.
cloud.add_id_tips: Please use this ID to add the device to your cloud account.
cloud.unbind_tips: Are you sure you want to unbind the device with GoodCloud? The device is bound to:
cloud.unbind_note: Note: This will only take effect in the selected region. If you bounded this device on different regions, do this on each region.
